title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve some pasta water.
Fry pancetta (or bacon) in a pan until crispy. Optionally add garlic, then remove it.
Whisk eggs with grated Parmesan cheese and black pepper in a bowl.
Add drained pasta to the pancetta pan off the heat. Pour in egg mixture and toss quickly.
Use reserved pasta water if needed to make the sauce creamy.
Serve with extra Parmesan and black pepper on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until browned.
In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until golden.
Add tomatoes and cook until thickened.
Stir in cream, then add chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

title: Beef Stir Fry
summary: Tender beef strips seared with fresh veggies and soy sauce for a quick savory Asian dish.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok and stir-fry garlic until fragrant.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3–4 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and oyster sauce.
Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Serve immediately with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Vegetable Biryani
summary: Fragrant basmati rice layered with spiced mixed vegetables and slow-cooked to perfection.
instructions: Wash and soak rice for 30 minutes, then cook until 70% done.
Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until golden.
Add vegetables and biryani masala, cook for 5 minutes.
Layer rice and vegetable mixture in a pot.
Cover and steam on low heat for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with raita or salad.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Classic Neapolitan pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil and olive oil.
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and mushrooms in butter until softened.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Sprinkle flour and stir for 1 minute.
Add beef stock and simmer until thickened.
Stir in sour cream and season with salt and pepper.
Serve over egg noodles or rice.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender beef strips simmered in a creamy mushroom sauce served over buttery egg noodles.
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft.
Heat oil in a pan, scramble eggs, then set aside.
Stir-fry shrimp or chicken until cooked.
Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind, and sugar.
Mix in eggs and bean sprouts.
Top with crushed peanuts and lime wedges before serving.

title: Pad Thai
summary: Stir-fried rice noodles with eggs, tofu, shrimp, peanuts and tamarind-based sauce.
instructions: Chop cucumbers, tomatoes, and onion.
Combine in a bowl with feta cheese and olives.
Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice.
Sprinkle oregano and salt.
Toss gently and serve fresh.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives and feta cheese tossed with oregano and olive oil.
instructions: Chop cucumbers, tomatoes, and onion.
Combine in a bowl with feta cheese and olives.
Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice.
Sprinkle oregano and salt.
Toss gently and serve fresh.

title: Fish Tacos
summary: Crispy battered fish wrapped in warm tortillas with slaw, lime crema and fresh salsa.
instructions: Mix flour with paprika and cumin for coating.
Dredge fish in flour mixture and fry until golden.
Warm tortillas in a pan.
Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, salsa, and sour cream.
Drizzle lime juice and serve immediately.
